channel.title: osx on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in osx on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Docker Kitematic (Beta) and iTerm2 3.0 Beta
item.description: I guess using everything in beta can cause issues, but whatever. Kitematic has an ‘Exec’ option for containers which opens a terminal connected to that container.

item.title: Hard link in OS X
item.description: Under linux, I used mount --bind olddir newdir to link a source code directory from a git repository in my Dropbox folder to another public git repository.
